title: Is Ranked que dissabled? Cannot play ranked.
body:
Hello fellow LoL players.

I logged in today after a long break, and I noticed I couldn't play ranked. Yet I don't see any post from the admins, nor anything on the service status related to this issue. Anyone who would be so kind to help me with the matter? Thank you so much. {{summoner:32}}

replies.body: If you're seeing all ranked queues grayed out, this is likely caused by corrupt files in your League directory. I'd recommend hitting the cog button in the top-right of your client and hit the button for *Initiate Full Repair*. Let me know if this caused any change.
